Package net.nanopool

Please see the NanoPoolDataSource documentation on general usage or this package - it's where the beef is.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CloseableDataSource A CloseableDataSource may contain physical database connections and other resources that should be properly closed when the DataSource is no longer in use.
ManagedNanoPool A ManagedNanoPool is something that can produce an object that implements the NanoPoolManagementMBean interface.
NanoPoolManagementMBean The NanoPoolManagementMBean is the JMX management interface for the NanoPoolDataSource.
 

Class Summary
AbstractDataSource This is a very simple base class for DataSource that throws UnsupportedOperationException on all method calls.
CheapRandom A medium-quality pseudo-random number generator.
NanoPoolDataSource NanoPool is a lightweight and fast JDBC2 connection pool.
Settings Settings is an atomically mutable container of attributes that describes to a NanoPoolDataSource how it should operate.
 

Exception Summary
NanoPoolRuntimeException Thrown under the same premises as any other RuntimeException.
 

Package net.nanopool Description

Please see the NanoPoolDataSource documentation on general usage or this package - it's where the beef is.
